  Vesta is a witty 6-year-old girl who lives in a desolate underground
  maze  the  ruins  of  a once-bright  city inhabited  by  humans  and
  perfect machines. Although this world can  be lonely,  she  is  kept

  the tasks she is assigned, although it knows much more than  it lets
  on. In order to survive in this passive yet hostile environment, BOT
  will give Vesta a real helper DROID.

  For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/646370/
